title: Installation issue: minimap2 (for aarch64)
body:
When I build minimap2 on my aarch64 platform, build error is reported:

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install -v minimap2
[+] /home/xiaojun/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.2.1/libiconv-1.16-l55npm3aywt3ht3trtormu2flaeejhym
```
